member.name: T:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpEnuSpecification
member.summary:
A frame specification with a local tangent plane coordinate system specialized to an east-north-up system, where the X axis is aligned toward east and the Y axis toward north.
Derived from Figure 8 from section 7.2.1 of version 1.0.0 of the GeoPose spec http://www.opengis.net/doc/DIS/geopose/1.0.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpEnuSpecification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpEnuSpecification.#ctor(Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.TangentPointPosition)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The position in latitude and longitude in decimal degrees, and height in meters.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpEnuSpecification.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.TangentPointPosition)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An ID that uniquely defines the frame within the authority.
A string uniquely specifying a source of reference frame specifications.
The position in latitude and longitude in decimal degrees, and height in meters.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpEnuSpecification.Position
member.summary: Gets the position in latitude and longitude in decimal degrees, and height in meters.

member.name: T:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpNedSpecification
member.summary:
A frame specification with a local tangent plane coordinate system specialized to an north-east-down system, where the X axis is aligned toward north and the Y axis toward east.
Derived from Figure 8 from section 7.2.1 of version 1.0.0 of the GeoPose spec http://www.opengis.net/doc/DIS/geopose/1.0.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpNedSpecification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpNedSpecification.#ctor(Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.TangentPointPosition)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The position in latitude and longitude in decimal degrees, and height in meters.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.LtpNedSpecification.Position
member.summary: Gets the position in latitude and longitude in decimal degrees, and height in meters.

member.name: T:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.QuaternionOrientedLtpEnuSpecification
member.summary:
A frame specification with a local tangent plane coordinate system specialized to an east-north-up system, where the X axis is aligned toward east and the Y axis toward north. Also contains a quaternion describing an orientation.
Derived from Figure 8 from section 7.2.1 of version 1.0.0 of the GeoPose spec http://www.opengis.net/doc/DIS/geopose/1.0.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.QuaternionOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.QuaternionOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.#ctor(Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.TangentPointPosition,Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.UnitQuaternion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The position in latitude, longitude, and height in meters.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.QuaternionOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.Orientation
member.summary: Gets the orientation.

member.name: T:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.TranslateRotateSpecification
member.summary:
A frame specification that specifies a translation and rotation relative to another frame specification. This type of frame specification cannot be the outermost frame in a chain or graph.
Derived from Figure 8 from section 7.2.1 of version 1.0.0 of the GeoPose spec http://www.opengis.net/doc/DIS/geopose/1.0.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.TranslateRotateSpecification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.TranslateRotateSpecification.#ctor(Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.UnitVector3,Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.UnitQuaternion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.TranslateRotateSpecification.Translation
member.summary: Gets the translation.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.TranslateRotateSpecification.Rotation
member.summary: Gets the rotation.

member.name: T:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.YawPitchRollOrientedLtpEnuSpecification
member.summary:
A frame specification with a local tangent plane coordinate system specialized to an east-north-up system, where the X axis is aligned toward east and the Y axis toward north. Also contains a yaw, pitch, and roll describing an orientation.
Derived from Figure 8 from section 7.2.1 of version 1.0.0 of the GeoPose spec http://www.opengis.net/doc/DIS/geopose/1.0.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.YawPitchRollOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.YawPitchRollOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.#ctor(Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.TangentPointPosition,Ethar.GeoPose.DataTypes.YawPitchRollAngles)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The position in latitude, longitude, and height in meters.
Yaw, pitch, and roll representing an orientation.

member.name: P:Ethar.GeoPose.Authority.FrameSpecifications.YawPitchRollOrientedLtpEnuSpecification.Orientation
member.summary: Gets the orientation.
